items.title: UEFA: $55M loss due to drop in U.S. dollar
items.summary: The U.S. dollar value dropped about 9% against a range of foreign currencies in the first months of 2025 and UEFA blames that fall for a $55M loss of revenue.

items.title: Platini ziet FIFA afglijden onder Infantino: 'Hij houdt van macht en rijkdom'
items.summary: Michel Platini ziet met lede ogen toe hoe de FIFA onder leiding van Gianni Infantino nog verder is afgegleden van zijn waarden en het voetbal. De Franse oud-international is ervan overtuigd dat het anders was gelopen, als hij in 2015 was aangesteld als opvolger van Sepp Blatter.

items.title: Frank legt uit waarom 'top guy' Heitinga nu assistent is bij Spurs

items.title: What are Carrick's plans to 'free Mainoo'?
Thomas Tuchel says England players‚Äô social skills as vital as talent at World Cup
items.summary: Manager stresses squad harmony crucial at tournament Two friendlies in March to come before naming squad Thomas Tuchel stressed talent alone is not enough to make his World Cup squad as the right ‚Äúsocial skills‚Äù and personality will be needed for England to stand a chance of glory this summer. It is just five months until the back-to-back Euros runners-up kick-off their quest for success in North America with their Group L opener against Croatia in Dallas. Tuchel only has two March friendlies before naming his squad for the tournament, having qualified impressively during an autumn when he spoke of building a ‚Äúbrotherhood‚Äù capable of beating the best.
